com.neovisionaries.android.opengl.impl
Class GLESImplBase

java.lang.Object
  com.neovisionaries.android.opengl.impl.GLESImplBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLES
Direct Known Subclasses:
GLESImpl11, GLESImpl20
public abstract class GLESImplBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements GLES

The base implementation of GLES interface.

All methods throw UnsupportedOperationException.

Author:
Takahiko Kawasaki
